roleset.name: tussle, fight

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: The Cardinal have rebounded from their tangle with Oregon well enough...

example.name: a little hard to make sense of, but just arg0
example.text: So before they say it is a white man tangle you know it 's because of a white man that this happens and they got to , you know , check around and they say who is the real guilty .

example.name: all args
example.text: ... the Congress-led government will not take a favourable decision and this would resolve their tangle with the RSS on the issue.
